product_name: TYLT TYLT VU Qi Wireless Charger
long_description: The TYLT VU wireless charger takes smartphone charging to the next level of simplicity. Just put your Qi phone on the VU and that's it. The 45deg angle lets you see the screen while it charges. Qi compatible. Charging indicator light. Soft-touch surface. Cable management. 45deg viewing angle. AC wall charger included. Available in gray and 3 vibrant colors. Phone must have Qi charging built-in or a Qi adapter to work with VU. There are many new phones with built-in Qi charging, including the LG Nexus 4, Nokia Lumia 810, 820, 822 and 920, and Droid DNA.
short_description: The TYLT VU wireless charger takes smartphone charging to the next level of simplicity. Just put your Qi phone on the VU and that's it. The 45deg angle lets you see the screen while it charges.
